---
title: "Frequency Distributions"
author: "Ernesto Diaz"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
set.seed(1234)
df = data.frame(
    gender=factor(rep(c("F", "M"), each=200)),
    age=round(c(rnorm(200, mean=25, sd=5), rnorm(200, mean=30, sd=5)))
)
head(df)
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

hist_plot = ggplot(df, aes(x=age)) + geom_histogram(color="black", fill="lightblue", binwidth=2) + xlab("Age") + ylab("Total") + ggtitle('Age Distribution Between Males and Females') + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
hist_plot
```

```{r}
poly_plot = ggplot(df, aes(x=age)) + geom_freqpoly(color="black", fill="lightblue", binwidth=2) + xlab("Age") + ylab("Total") + ggtitle('Age Distribution Between Males and Females') + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
poly_plot
```

```{r}
box_and_whisker = ggplot(df, aes(x=age, y=gender)) + geom_boxplot(fill='lightblue', color="black") + xlab("Total") + ylab("Age") + ggtitle('Age Distribution Between Males and Females') + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
box_and_whisker
```
